tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Awful. He makes students feel stupid for asking questions that he apparently feels have an obvious answer. The structure of the class is insane. Rapidly jot down everything he says & prepare to answer specific questions about it later. You will not retain any of the info after its over because all you did was cram for constant tests and quizzes.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: We had an exam every other week and 8-10 chapters of reading were assign per exam. It was waaay too much and then we had a quiz right after lectures which gave us no time to learn and retain the material. There is so much material squeezed into such a short period of time. DON\'T TAKE THIS CLASS unless you want a low grade or fail!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Not sure if this is the same teacher,but I took bio160 saturdays last quarter on Mcchord through Pierce.Worst class taken,and it was the last class to complete my degree.Tests were every other week.Countless hours of homework a week.At least 5+people dropped out last quarter.(out of 30students).Struggled immensely and recieved a C because he curved
